data.title: Celebration of the two hundredth anniversary of the settlement of Hadley, Massachusetts, at Hadley, June 8, 1859 : including the address by Rev. Prof. F.D. Huntington ..., poem by Edward C. Porter ...
data.meta_description: Cover title: Bi-centennial celebration at Hadley, June 8, 1859. Also available in digital form.
data.text:
